snippet: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman said his office was responding to a “crisis in confidence” in the public’s perception of the ability of local prosecutors to handle these cases properly.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman announces formation of special unit to investigate cases of police killings of unarmed citizens.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman said his office was responding to a “crisis in confidence” in the public’s perception of the ability of local prosecutors to handle these cases properly.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Creates Special Unit on Killings by the Police
headline.print_headline: Schneiderman Creates Unit on Killings by the Police
